title: The failure of exchanging the prestige edition skin( Irelia)
body: When I paid 2,000 tokens for the skin under the situation that I did not have the champion, so today I bought  champion but I found that I didn's get the skin and my tokens is paid, what's wrong with this?  And what should I do for next?

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to look through the history and make sure everything updates properly.
